name: Stick.EXE
description:
Made by AeroBlizz - 

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOAhh_k0X2AFY3w-_WyH5pA

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/aero_blizz07/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/BlizzAero

You are in your room just browsing through your PC and suddenly your pc behaves wierdly. What would you do???

Well, Stick.EXE is a game which is inspired by

Alan Becker stickman videos

https://www.youtube.com/user/noogai89

in which you go against a stick figure which is trying to destroy your PC.  But with that comes the great mystery which you have to unravel in order to face the foe.

You are operating your windows and suddenly some mysterious program is trying to make contact with you.  But what you perceive  is all that matters. Maybe there is someone who just wants to see your PC world burn or maybe it's all just a hoax.

(In simple words :- In this game you can operate windows or a clone of it, I bet you won't be able to spot the difference and at some point you are in conflict with some 2d figurine. That's the plot!!)
